data.scheme_name: Gujarat State Biotechnology (BT) Policy 2022-27 - Incentives for Mega & Special Projects -Capital Assistance -Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides capital assistance @25% of eligible Gross Fixed capital Assistance with a ceiling of Rs. 20000 lakhs and other benefits such as Operational Assistance, EPF Assistance, Interest Subsidy on Term Loan, Electricity Duty.
data.eligibility: All biotechnology units are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Assistance shall be eligible for a maximum duration of five years to the respective eligible BT unit. 
  2. Interest on Cash Credit Loan or Working Capital or Loan taken for any other purpose shall not be considered.
data.beneficiaries: All biotechnology units are eligible under the scheme.
data.context: The main purpose of this scheme is to make Gujarat a preferred and globally competitive destination for development of biotechnology products and services
data.objective:
The main objectives of this scheme are:
To promote ecosystem strengthening projects 
To develop strategic and emerging sectors in biotechnology
To encourage sustainable living by promoting adoption of bio-technologies, biotechnology products and services
data.description: Scheme provides capital assistance @25% of eligible Gross Fixed capital Assistance with a ceiling of Rs. 20000 lakhs and other benefits such as Operational Assistance, EPF Assistance, Interest Subsidy on Term Loan, Electricity Duty.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply from this site https://dstpolicy.gujarat.gov.in/login
data.funding_facilitator: Gujarat State Biotechnology Mission, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: Capital Assistance shall be disbursed in Twenty (20) Quarterly installments spread over Five (5) years.
data.checklist_info_a:
Industry Connect Module
Industry Connect: Organization
Request for In-principle Approval
Incorporation certificate and PAN card of applicant entity
Project brief on company letter head
copy of Promoter's PAN and Aadhar card
Format for submitting Application for availing assistance
Format for Capital Assistance, Projected Operational and Projected Supplementary Claim
Letter of Undertaking
data.checklist_info_d:
Address : Gujarat State Biotechnology Mission , Department of Science & Technology, Government of Gujarat , Block No. 11, 9th Floor, Udyog Bhavan, Gandhinagar-382010
Ph. No. : 079-232-52197
Email ID : mnbtm7[at]gujarat[dot]gov[dot]in
data.beneficiary: Biotechnology Industries -Private Limited Company,Public Company,Limited Liability Partnership (LLP)- Gujarat - All Non-MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
